DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the combination of Temozolomide and Cisplatinum is effective in the treatment of malignant glial tumours of children and adolescents
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Cisplatin + Temozolomide in Malignant Glial Tumours in Children and Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Age from 4th birthday and younger than 21st birthday Histologically documented malignant glial tumour (WHO classification grade III and IV) : astrocytoma, oligodendroglioma, oligoastrocytoma and mixed tumours Measurable and evaluable disease by the imaging criteria (MRI) Patient not previously treated by either of the two drugs Malignant brain stem tumours are excluded
